verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam. Do ye <S%H552>indeed<s%> in <S%H482>silence<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>? Do ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H4339>uprightly<s%>, O ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>?
Nay <S%H3820><s%>, in heart ye <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H5766>wickedness<s%>; Ye <S%H6424>weigh<s%> out the <S%H2555>violence<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
The <S%H7563>wicked<s%> are <S%H2114>estranged<s%> from the <S%H7358>womb<s%>: They go <S%H8582>astray<s%> as soon as they are <S%H990>born<s%>, <S%H1696>speaking<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>.
Their <S%H2534>poison<s%> is <S%H1823>like<s%> the <S%H2534>poison<s%> of a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>: They are like the <S%H2795>deaf<s%> <S%H6620>adder<s%> that <S%H331>stoppeth<s%> her <S%H241>ear<s%>,
Which <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> not to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3907>charmers<s%>, <S%H2266>Charming<s%> never so <S%H2449>wisely<s%>.

Break <S%H2040><s%> their <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: Break <S%H5422>out<s%> the great <S%H4459>teeth<s%> of the young <S%H3715>lions<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Let them melt <S%H3988>away<s%> as <S%H4325>water<s%> that runneth <S%H1980>apace<s%>: When he <S%H1869>aimeth<s%> his <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, let them be as though they were cut <S%H4135>off<s%>.

Let them be as a <S%H7642>snail<s%> which <S%H8557>melteth<s%> and passeth <S%H1980>away<s%>, Like the untimely <S%H5309>birth<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%>, that hath not <S%H2372>seen<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%>.
Before your <S%H5518>pots<s%> can <S%H995>feel<s%> the <S%H329>thorns<s%>, He will take them away with a <S%H8175>whirlwind<s%>, the <S%H2416>green<s%> and the burning <S%H2740>alike<s%>.

The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> when he <S%H2372>seeth<s%> the <S%H5359>vengeance<s%>: He shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H6471>feet<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>;

So that <S%H120>men<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Verily there is a <S%H6529>reward<s%> for the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: Verily there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> that <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
